info.name: Wordcounter.net Working Dark
info.description: The dark theme on wordcounter.net did not work for me and I didn't like that, so I made my own. Currently in progress.
info.additionalInfo:
Expect minimal updates at most. If you like this theme, feel free to rip the code and make your own

I'm not sure but I think this should only really work with the default style. I can't change it to test that out because Chromebook OS is hell but it's what I've got.

This was my first userstyle and if you'd like to bang it up, I recommend using the shit out of "inspect element" in order to figure out which class goes where.
